REUTERS.UNKNOWN: Y f2319 reute r f BC-SUN-<SUN>-RAISES-HEAT 04-07 0055

TEXT.TITLE: SUN <SUN> RAISES HEATING OIL BARGE PRICE
TEXT.BODY: Sun Co's Sun Refining and Marketing Co subsidiary said it raised the price it charges contract barge customers for heating oil in New York harbor by 0.50 cent a gallon, effective today. The increase brings the contract barge price to 50.50 cts a gallon, Sun said. Reuter
